mapper.insert: insert into reservation (rno, mno, out_ano, in_ano, arp_price, arp_count, arp_date, arp_up_date) values (#{rno}, #{mno}, #{out_ano}, #{in_ano}, #{arp_price}, #{arp_count}, now(), now())
insert into reservation_detail ( rno, ko_name, en_lname, en_fname, birth, gender) values (#{rno}, #{ko_name}, #{en_lname}, #{en_fname}, #{birth}, #{gender})
